text:
="preserve">Jean-François Garreaud (1 April 1946 – 9 July 2020) was a French actor. Garreaud was born in Montmorency, Val-d'Oise, France. His best-known role is that of Jean Dabin in "Violette Nozière", released in 1978. He was also known for his role as Henri in "I as in Icarus" in 1979.
Garreaud died on 9 July 2020 in Saint-Jory-de-Chalais, France at the age of 74.
